column5: Anything for them to save a buck.
I like the rattle of the bottles. A 12 pack every 6 months or so.
I drink Carling Ice, the Grimsby In and Out only carries it in twelves but charges me the 24 price if I get 2x12, didn't know they stopped the partitions in the 24's.
The breweries get to save a buck a box.
